//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "baddie2", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM_FLUSH", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "player" );

	task ( "focus" )
	{
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_ENEMY", "player" );
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Focus" );
	}

	dowait ( "focus" );
	set ( "SET_TASK", "Attack" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "NULL" );
}
